string.name: no_permissions
string.description: Text shown on Android Toast when permissions are not granted. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]

string.name: low_storage_error
string.description: Text shown on Android Toast when detector dependencies can not be downloaded due to low storage. [CHAR_LIMIT=70]

resources.string: Detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

string.name: switch_viewer
string.description: Short text shown on the settings menu to let the user switch viewer. [CHAR_LIMIT=30]
